#include<bits/stdc++.h>

using namespace std;

string getString(int number){
	
	//123
	string ret;
	
	while(number){
		
		ret.push_back((number%10)+'0');
		number/=10;
		
	}
	
	reverse(ret.begin(),ret.end());
	
	return ret;
	
}

int main(void){
	
	int testCases,Case=1,X,Y,i,j;
	
	scanf("%d",&testCases);
	
	while(testCases--){
		
		scanf("%d%d",&X,&Y);
		
		string comp=getString(Y);
		
		int copy=X;	
		for(i=1;i<=5000000;i++){
						
			double now=(double )i*(double )log10(X);
			int digits=(int )now;
			double decimal=powl(10.0L,now-digits);
		    
			for(j=0;j<min(7,digits);j++)
			  decimal*=10.0;
			  		    
		    int integral=(int )decimal;
		    
		    string str=getString((int )integral);
			
			if(str.substr(0,comp.size())==comp) break;
					
		}
		
		printf("Case %d: %d\n",Case++,i);

	}
	
	return 0;
	
}
